verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Send <WH7971> you men, <WH582> that they may search <WH8446> the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> which <WH834> I give <WH5414> to the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478> of every <WH376> tribe <WH4294> of their fathers <WH1> shall you send <WH7971> a man, <WH376> every <WH3605> one a ruler <WH5387> among them.

And Moses <WH4872> by the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> sent <WH7971> them from the wilderness <WH4057> of Paran: <WH6290> all <WH3605> those men <WH582> were heads <WH7218> of the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>
And these <WH428> were their names: <WH8034> of the tribe <WH4294> of Reuben, <WH7205> Shammua <WH8051> the son <WH1121> of Zaccur. <WH2139>
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Simeon, <WH8095> Shaphat <WH8202> the son <WH1121> of Hori. <WH2753>
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Judah, <WH3063> Caleb <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Jephunneh. <WH3312>
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Issachar, <WH3485> Igal <WH3008> the son <WH1121> of Joseph. <WH3130>
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Ephraim, <WH669> Oshea <WH1954> the son <WH1121> of Nun. <WH5126>
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Benjamin, <WH1144> Palti <WH6406> the son <WH1121> of Raphu. <WH7505>
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Zebulun, <WH2074> Gaddiel <WH1427> the son <WH1121> of Sodi. <WH5476>
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Joseph, <WH3130> namely, of the tribe <WH4294> of Manasseh, <WH4519> Gaddi <WH1426> the son <WH1121> of Susi. <WH5485>
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Dan, <WH1835> Ammiel <WH5988> the son <WH1121> of Gemalli. <WH1582>
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Asher, <WH836> Sethur <WH5639> the son <WH1121> of Michael. <WH4317>
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Naphtali, <WH5321> Nahbi <WH5147> the son <WH1121> of Vophsi. <WH2058>
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Gad, <WH1410> Geuel <WH1345> the son <WH1121> of Machi. <WH4352>

These <WH428> are the names <WH8034> of the men <WH582> which <WH834> Moses <WH4872> sent <WH7971> to spy <WH8446> out the land. <WH776> And Moses <WH4872> called <WH7121> Oshea <WH1954> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126> Jehoshua. <WH3091>

And Moses <WH4872> sent <WH7971> them to spy <WH8446> out the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> and said <WH559> to them, Get <WH5927> you up this <WH2088> way southward, <WH5045> and go <WH5927> up into the mountain: <WH2022>
And see <WH7200> the land, <WH776> what <WH4100> it is, and the people <WH5971> that dwells <WH3427> therein, <WH5921> whether they be strong <WH2389> or weak, <WH7504> few <WH4592> or many; <WH7227>

And what <WH4100> the land <WH776> is that they dwell <WH3427> in, whether it be good <WH2896> or bad; <WH7451> and what <WH4100> cities <WH5892> they be that they dwell <WH3427> in, whether in tents, <WH4264> or in strong <WH4013> holds; <WH4013>

And what <WH4100> the land <WH776> is, whether it be fat <WH8082> or lean, <WH7330> whether there be wood <WH6086> therein, or not. And be you of good courage, <WH2388> and bring <WH3947> of the fruit <WH6529> of the land. <WH776> Now the time <WH3117> was the time <WH3117> of the first ripe <WH1061> grapes. <WH6025>
So they went <WH5927> up, and searched <WH8446> the land <WH776> from the wilderness <WH4057> of Zin <WH6790> to Rehob, <WH7340> as men come <WH935> to Hamath. <WH2574>

And they ascended <WH5927> by the south, <WH5045> and came <WH935> to Hebron; <WH2275> where <WH8033> Ahiman, <WH289> Sheshai, <WH8344> and Talmai, <WH8526> the children <WH3211> of Anak, <WH6061> were. (Now Hebron <WH2275> was built <WH1129> seven <WH7651> years <WH8141> before <WH6440> Zoan <WH6814> in Egypt. <WH4714>)

And they came <WH935> to the brook <WH5158> of Eshcol, <WH812> and cut <WH3772> down from there <WH8033> a branch <WH2156> with one <WH259> cluster <WH811> of grapes, <WH6025> and they bore <WH5375> it between <WH996> two <WH8147> on a staff; <WH4132> and they brought of the pomegranates, <WH7416> and of the figs. <WH8384>

The place <WH4725> was called <WH7121> the brook <WH5158> Eshcol, <WH812> because <WH5921> <WH182> of the cluster <WH811> of grapes which <WH834> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> cut <WH3772> down from there. <WH8033>
And they returned <WH7725> from searching <WH8446> of the land <WH776> after <WH7093> forty <WH705> days. <WH3117>

And they went <WH3212> and came <WH935> to Moses, <WH4872> and to Aaron, <WH175> and to all <WH3605> the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> to the wilderness <WH4057> of Paran, <WH6290> to Kadesh; <WH6946> and brought <WH7725> back <WH7725> word <WH1697> to them, and to all <WH3605> the congregation, <WH5712> and showed <WH7200> them the fruit <WH6529> of the land. <WH776>

And they told <WH5608> him, and said, <WH559> We came <WH935> to the land <WH776> where <WH834> you sent <WH7971> us, and surely it flows <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey; <WH1706> and this <WH2088> is the fruit <WH6529> of it.

Nevertheless <WH657> the people <WH5971> be strong <WH5794> that dwell <WH3427> in the land, <WH776> and the cities <WH5892> are walled, <WH1219> and very <WH3966> great: <WH1419> and moreover <WH1571> we saw <WH7200> the children <WH3211> of Anak <WH6061> there. <WH8033>

The Amalekites <WH6003> dwell <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of the south: <WH5045> and the Hittites, <WH2850> and the Jebusites, <WH2983> and the Amorites, <WH567> dwell <WH3427> in the mountains: <WH2022> and the Canaanites <WH3669> dwell <WH3427> by the sea, <WH3220> and by the coast <WH3027> of Jordan. <WH3383>

And Caleb <WH3612> stilled <WH2013> the people <WH5971> before <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> and said, <WH559> Let us go <WH5927> up at once, and possess <WH3423> it; for we are well able <WH3201> to overcome <WH3201> it.
But the men <WH582> that went <WH5927> up with him said, <WH559> We be not able <WH3201> to go <WH5927> up against <WH413> the people; <WH5971> for they are stronger <WH2389> than we.

And they brought <WH3318> up an evil <WH1681> report <WH1681> of the land <WH776> which <WH834> they had searched <WH8446> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> The land, <WH776> through which <WH834> we have gone <WH5674> to search <WH8446> it, is a land <WH776> that eats <WH398> up the inhabitants <WH3427> thereof; and all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> that we saw <WH7200> in it are men <WH582> of a great stature. <WH4060>

And there <WH8033> we saw <WH7200> the giants, <WH5303> the sons <WH1121> of Anak, <WH6061> which come of the giants: <WH1368> and we were in our own sight <WH5869> as grasshoppers, <WH2284> and so we were in their sight. <WH5869>
